article_metadata.description: Last week, President Obama convened a “Summit on College Opportunity.” The gathering at the White House focused on “supporting colleges to work together to dramatically improve persistence and increase college completion.” For his part, the President lamented that “higher education increasingly feels out of reach.” True enough. Nationwide, college tuitions have [...]
article_metadata.author: Tom Lindsay
